data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Iron Heroes Counter Collection (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Iron Heroes Counter Collection

4E Fantasy Token Pack

This token pack brings you every monster in the Iron Heroes Bestiary - including counters for each class in the Iron Heroes Revised Core Book as well as multiple representations of the 3 new character classes found in the Iron Heroes Player's Companion. These tokens would fit in with any fantasy based RPG campaign.

The tokens have been organized by genre and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • arcanist 01 (medium)
  • arcanist 02 (medium)
  • arcanist 03 (medium)
  • archer 01 (medium)
  • archer 02 (medium)
  • archer 03 (medium)
  • armiger 01 (medium)
  • armiger 02 (medium)
  • armiger 03 (medium)
  • berserker 01 (medium)
  • berserker 02 (medium)
  • berserker 03 (medium)
  • blade ooze (large)
  • blade tyrant (large)
  • bone machine (huge)
  • champion 01 (medium)
  • champion 02 (medium)
  • champion 03 (medium)
  • clawing dark (huge)
  • cliff ogre (large)
  • colossus of thard (colossal)
  • colossus of thard towers level2 (colossal)
  • colossus of thard towers level3 (colossal)
  • dedicate female 01 (medium)
  • dedicate male 01 (medium)
  • dedicate male 02 (medium)
  • demonic brute 01 (medium)
  • demonic brute 02 (large)
  • demonic knight 01 (medium)
  • demonic knight 02 (medium)
  • demonic minion 01 (medium)
  • demonic minion 02 (medium)
  • dimensional prowler (large)
  • dire gloom (medium)
  • dreaded sorceror 01 (medium)
  • dreaded sorceror 02 (medium)
  • dreaded sorceror 03 (medium)
  • emerald serpent (large)
  • executioner 01 (medium)
  • executioner 02 (medium)
  • executioner 03 (medium)
  • flesh flayer (large)
  • glitterwing (tiny)
  • gossamer wing (large)
  • gray troll (large)
  • harrier 01 (medium)
  • harrier 02 (medium)
  • harrier 03 (medium)
  • horse (large)
  • hundoon overseer (medium)
  • hundoon royal (medium)
  • hundoon warrior (medium)
  • hundoon worker (medium)
  • hunter 01 (medium)
  • hunter 02 (medium)
  • hunter 03 (medium)
  • hunting spirit (medium)
  • incarnation (huge)
  • iron devil (large)
  • kuhlani (medium)
  • man at arms 01 (medium)
  • man at arms 02 (medium)
  • man at arms 03 (medium)
  • miniList.txt moss troll (large)
  • myrmidon female 01 (medium)
  • myrmidon male 01 (medium)
  • myrmidon male 02 (medium)
  • necrophage (tiny)
  • paeldren (medium)
  • piprisiug (medium)
  • plague giant (large)
  • sand homounculus (small)
  • selvrin (medium)
  • shellback (huge)
  • skaerrim (medium)
  • skeleton human warrior (medium)
  • spirit companion 01 (large)
  • spirit companion 01 (medium)
  • spirit companion 01 (small)
  • spirit companion 02 (medium)
  • spirit companion 02 (small)
  • spirit companion 03 (medium)
  • spirit companion 03 (small)
  • spirit companion 04 (medium)
  • spirit companion 04 (small)
  • spiritualist female 01 (medium)
  • spiritualist male 01 (medium)
  • spiritualist male 02 (medium)
  • thief 01 (medium)
  • thief 02 (medium)
  • thief 03 (medium)
  • trondar (medium)
  • ungulak (medium)
  • vardrag (huge)
  • war leader 01 (medium)
  • war leader 02 (medium)
  • war leader 03 (medium)
  • weapon master 01 (medium)
  • weapon master 02 (medium)
  • weapon master 03 (medium)

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 17, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: Iron Heroes Counter Collection4E Fantasy Token PackThis token pack brings you every monster in the Iron Heroes Bestiary - including counters for each class in the Iron Heroes Revised Core Book as well as multiple representations of the 3 new character classes found in the Iron Heroes Player's Companion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

data.legal_notice:
This Fiery Dragon Productions product was converted for use with the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop application from SmiteWorks USA, LLC. This product is Copyright 2010, Fiery Dragon Productions and SmiteWorks USA, LLC. Used with permission from Fiery Dragon Productions. This product's format, programming code, and presentation is copyrighted by SmiteWorks USA, LLC.
